articles.content: Mohammad Rizwan and Agha Salman made unbeaten half-centuries as Pakistan eased to a seven-wicket win over the Netherlands in the second one-day international (ODI) in Rotterdam on Thursday to complet… [+2961 chars]

articles.content:
